message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, now I'll take a bit more!
You took a bit more, I'll take a bit more too!
You upped your offer, now it's my turn to take more!
You took more, but I'm still not giving up!
You're not budging, so I'll take the majority!
You're getting greedy, but I'll try to make a comeback!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the last bit!
You're getting desperate, I'll try to squeeze a bit more!
You're getting close to the deadline, I'm taking what's left!
You're almost out of time, but I'll try to squeeze a bit more!
It's the last chance, take it or leave it!
